Success was short lived though as he then was pulled violently by the carry strap on his school bag and as he turned he faced a evilly smiling Nicky. "He short fry" Nicky comically remarked. "Tell he other  leprechaun they owe my gold for finding you"  There was immature giggle from the group as Nicky grin stretched across his whole face. 

"Would you ever piss off, your not funny at all" Olan mumbled to himself as Nicky ignored the weak defence of Olan. "How many midgets does it take to fix a light bulb?" Nicky  joked 
Olan turned to walk away but Nicky followed. He continued to joke about until only finally turned into a small narrow alley way only to be followed pursuit "Get the fuck back here!" Nicky suddenly change tone as he grabbed him by the shoulder.

"Olan I'm sorry just make it stop! I will never say anything bad again! Just make it stop! Help! IM SHRINKING!

info.brief_description: Nicky is a 17 year old bully. He shrink's to microscopic sizes in the hands of his victim
info.description:
Nicky is an average 17yr teen. Nick mocks and makes fun of anything and every that maybe used agaist them and for poor Olan it's his height that Nick will not stop bring up...

Olan is a normal teenage boy. He is in the same year as Nick despite only recently turning 16. He is quite popular and sporty sort of person but there is one guy in his year that just loves to torrment him every day and night because he is small for his age. Olan is growing feed up of this situation as it has gone beyond funny and 'only a joke' anymore he needs to take action but how? He can't fight him he would surely lose, he can't tell his principle or parents because it would be a sign of utter weakness and talking to him has only encouraged the problem as others are now starting to join in on the joke, something has to be done....

But this is all about to change rapidly as Olan mystically finds he has the supernatural power to shrink everything and anything aswell as people!

General Facts About the Characters to start you off...,


Nicky (Known mostly as Nick)
Height: 5 foot 8
Skin Tone : White Caucasian
Hair : Dark blonde ,short hair cut
Eye colour : Light blue
Nicky has a average build and would be classed fit for he does numerous contact sports... He is popular and hangs in large groups that he tries to impress by mocking the likes of Olan with is witty, snappy comments

Olan
Height: 5 foot 3
Skin Tone : White Caucasian
Hair : Jet Black , Average length hair
Eye colour : Light brown
Olan is actually quite popular and his kind and friendly to most. He is good at sports dispute his skinny build, but that is due to his slighty below average height. Olan is gotten to the point he is being bullied and is feed up of Nick he wants a resolution to his problem and when the 16 year old gets it he wants to inflect revenge to his bully in every given way!

RULES:

1. Please use proper English grammar and sentences -I will delete very poor efforts but would love to see much more 'polished' chapters

2. NO very short chapters! These will be deleted straight away... This is a literacy website extremly short chapter and sudden ending will be terminated without question! If you want to pull the story in a direction that its not flowing in PM me ill see what I can do

3. NO Female giantess(es)! This is a male giant fetish story and nothing else... I will allow female character but I see no need in many scenario's and certainly not female giantess(es)

4. I do allow any other types of fetish like foot but please keep them relievent and to the point.

5. I will allow sexual activities (masterbathion) but please keep it to the major characters like Olan..

6. Enjoy follow your desired path PLEASE ADD!

Note : PM is you have any idea's, thoughts or plans if you have any....
